headline: United States Construction Industry Report 2025 | Market to Reach $2.92 trillion by 2034 at a CAGR of 4.4%, Driven by Technological Innovations Like AI, BIM, and 3D Printing
summary: The U.S. construction market hit USD 1.90 trillion in 2024 and is forecasted to grow at a 4.40% CAGR to USD 2.92 trillion by 2034. Key trends include rapid infrastructural development, technology integration like AI and IoT, and green building demand. headline: Lennar Debuts New Home Collection at Tillage Farms, With Pricing in the mid $100,000s
summary: Lennar, one of the nation's leading homebuilders, today announced a new home collection now available in Tillage Farms, a master-planned community of single-family homes in Princeton, Texas. With pricing starting in the mid $100,000s, Lennar's Dream Collection offers innovative home designs at desirable price points in one of the fastest growing cities in Collin County.

headline: Global Residential Construction Market Growth Analysis and Outlook Report 2025-2034 | Expansion Spurred by Affordable Housing Demand, Green Building Practices, and Adoption of BIM & 3D Printing
summary: The global residential construction market is poised for significant growth, reaching USD 4.92 trillion in 2024 and projected to expand at a 5.00% CAGR to USD 8.01 trillion by 2034. Key trends driving this growth include sustainable practices, affordable housing demand, and technology innovations like BIM and 3D printing. Government policies supporting green construction and affordable housing further accelerate market dynamics, as developers innovate with energy-efficient designs. Noteworthy pl
